sources.title: Bo za (1980)
sources.description: A veteran and tough sheriff's wife has a gambling problem. He works both sides of the law. He gets teamed up with a young cop who he is told to take under his wing. They end up working together well and the young cop's martial arts skills are very useful. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bo-za-1980/

metadata.Plot: A veteran and tough sheriff's wife has a gambling problem. He works both sides of the law. He gets teamed up with a young cop who he is told to take under his wing. They end up working together well and the young cop's martial arts skills are very useful.
metadata.Writer: Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung, Yun-Sheng Pan, Hung Wai Tan
metadata.Actors: Roy Chiao, Wei Tung, Shi-Kwan Yen
